description:
fter her near-death experience, Kozue had been acting weirdly.  Maya and Ami show her various occult things, but she doesn`t respond at all.  As a last resort, they make Fumiaki show his spoon bending trick, but it does nothing.  They decide to go to the afterlife to bring her back, and with Smile and JK.`s help, they sneak into the school in the middle of the night!
Source: crunchyroll
